text: Udvardy () is a Hungarian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Anna Udvardy (born ?), Hungarian film producer and production manager *Ferdinand Udvardy (1895 – post 1945), Hungarian aviator *György Udvardy (born 1960), Hungarian prelate *Miklos Udvardy (1919 – 1998), Hungarian biologist and biogeographer *Panna Udvardy (born 1998), Hungarian tennis player Category:Hungarian-language surnames
title: Udvardy
